name: Linkz.ai – Automatic link previews on hover
author: Linkz.ai

sections.description:
Linkz.ai improves visitor retention on your website & blog with live link previews. Linkz.ai automatically extracts & shows linked content, e.g. videos, presentations, articles, blog posts & 1000+ web embeds within your website.

ðŸ’¬ Live link preview on hover
As users hover over a link, a pop-up appears, offering a summary of the linked content, from articles and blog posts to videos and presentations. Keeps your audience engaged and informed in real-time.

ðŸ“º Rich link previews on click
With rich link previews, when visitors click on a hyperlink, Linkz.ai will extract & show linked rich media content inside your website. Rich link previews are supported for YouTube, TikTok, Typeform, Prezi & 1000+ websites. Learn more â†’

ðŸ“° Article link previews on click
Linkz.ai extracts & shows text content for hyperlinks pointing to third-party articles, blog posts, guides and other content. You will keep visitors on your website and save them from the tab-overload. Learn more â†’

ðŸ“„ Integrated PDF-viewer & file-viewer
Automatically transform hyperlinks to download files into immersive file previews with a file viewer integrated within your website, increasing the time spent on your site. Learn more â†’

ðŸ“Š Link preview analytics
Explore the most previewed & trending links on your website and correct broken links.

More from Linkz.ai:

  • ðŸ“± Mobile-friendly link auto-previews
  • ðŸ’» Control where on a website to display live link previews
  • ðŸŽ¨ Themes
  • ðŸŒ™ Auto light/dark mode
  • ðŸ›  2-minute installation
sections.faq:
Can I use Linkz.ai for free?

Yes, absolutely! You have a free link preview quota every month.

What are the premium features?

Premium features give, you higher link preview quotas, analytics and custom styles. Learn more about plans.
sections.changelog:
1.1.5

  • Re-engineered script for performance & speed
  • Article preview on click
  • File preview on click
  • New themes
  • Compatibility with the latest WrdPress version

1.0

  • Welcome Linkz.ai for WordPress
  • Install Linkz.ai without leaving WordPress
